RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 8700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE IS ROYALTY rallied on the turn wresting the lead in the four path upper stretch drawing out under a drive. MS. LADY T a step slow early circled out on the turn coming six wide in upper stretch bidding late as second best. STORY CHANNEL away alertly pressed to clear on the turn dueling in upper stretch wearing down late. STEPPINPERFECTION pressed the pace to upper stretch weakening there along the rail. PACKIN slow early lost ground to upper stretch posing no menace there. COUNTESSOFLOVELACE was always outrun. LUNA MIA faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: She Is Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied turn, angled 4 wide lane, wrested lead, drew out

ENTRY.NAME: Steppinperfection
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Lady T
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, circled turn, 6 wide into lane, bid second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Mia
ENTRY.OWNER: Ruiz Lilliam and MM Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Packin
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Story Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed pace, dueled top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Countessoflovelace
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE OCTOBER 9, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 9 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNCLE CARLITO tracked the pace looming in upper stretch surging clear late in the four path. MAS CHIKILIN stalked the pace saving ground to upper stretch bidding gamely late on the inside. HONOR LIFE slow early lost ground to upper stretch coming on late six wide. BEYOND GONE raced evenly vying from mid track down the lane hanging late. FREE SPEECH broke sharply speeding clear holding the lead through the turn being reeled in upper stretch giving way there. QUICK ENTRY played no factor. BOLD PROPHET folded up on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Mas Chikilin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, saved ground to lane, bid gamely inside

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Carlito
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, loomed lane, surged clear 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Quick Entry
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, mid track lane, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Honor Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, came on late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Prophet
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up on turn

ENTRY.NAME: Free Speech
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, sped clear early, weary upper stretch gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 9 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEJOHN stalked the pace drawing even abreast rival on the turn digging in down the lane finding more late. HOLD THE IRISH raced evenly vying from mid track down the lane surging late. KAZTHAROS stalked the pace looming into upper stretch lacking punch at the end. TODAY MATTERS slow early lost ground to upper stretch gaining some late six wide. HOLIDAY DANCER raced evenly lacking more. FOOL FOR THE CITY set the pace being hooked on the far turn dueling into upper stretch wearing down late on the inside. HROTHGAR outrun early would tire.

ENTRY.NAME: Fool for the City
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, dueled inside to lane, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Kaztharos
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed to lane, lacked late punch

ENTRY.NAME: Today Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out to lane, gained some late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Hrothgar
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Dejohn
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drew even far turn, dueled lane, up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Hold the Irish
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, mid track lane, surged late

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry An Additional 2 lbs. For Each Such Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REJUVENATE dug in gamely. CAJUN MANDATE pressed to wire. BORN FOR VICTORY surged gamely late. SKYLAS GOLD dueled inside of foes being outfinished. PERFECT GENTLEMAN veered in at the break. SOMERSET BAY in a bit close at the break. DELAYED ENGAGEMENT weakened late. AW ITE was not involved.

ENTRY.OWNER: Inman Betty Tunstall Shirley and Tunstall James

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR W V BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING $6,500 FOR HORSES THAT HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 9 Allow ed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: XTRAORDINARYMOTION pressed the pace shaking clear on the turn widening in upper stretch being ridden out. JULES RULES a step slow through the turn emerged in upper stretch chasing a loose leader to wire closing the gap late. MACHEN MAYHEM raced evenly moving four wide down the lane holding the others safe. TRACE ESTATE slow early saved ground to upper stretch posing no threat. HOLLY ROLLER gave way on the turn. MACHEN REIGNS raced a step slow tiring down the lane. PETTYFORURTHOUGHTS chased through the turn wearing out in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Trace Estate
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Jules Rules
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, emerged top lane, closed gap

ENTRY.NAME: Xtraordinarymotion
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, shook clear turn, widened lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Machen Mayhem
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lane, held others

ENTRY.NAME: Holly Roller
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Machen Reigns
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Pettyforurthoughts
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, spent lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 9 Allowed 3 lbs. (Clai ming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDIAN BUZZ rallied on the far turn saving ground to upper stretch surging clear late along the inside. POSEIDON'S SON advanced on the backside bidding clear on the far turn digging in down the lane ceding late to inside pressure. RIVER KAT pressed a narrow lead early being passed on the far turn staying after it chasing through the lane. MONEY FOR MISCHIEF slow early would pick up tired ones. GOLDEN TONE gave a prompted middle move chasing on the far turn tiring in upper stretch. COMMANDER KEITH slow early saved ground to upper stretch tiring late on the inside. FIRE KING pressed the early pace then wilted abruptly on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Buzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied far turn, saved ground to lane, surged clear on inside

ENTRY.NAME: River Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on pace, passed far turn, chased lane

ENTRY.NAME: Commander Keith
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground to lane, tired on the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Fire King
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted abruptly far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Money for Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, picked up tired ones

ENTRY.NAME: Poseidon's Son
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, bid clear far turn, dug in lane, ceded

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid move, chased turn, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 88. Starter Allowance Purse 14600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 9 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023 Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNIGHT'S CROSS stalked the pace bidding clear on the far turn drawing off down the lane to win as much the best. ZERO GRAVITY hustled to the top set the pace through the backside being passed on the far turn proving no match in upper stretch holding as second best. TUSKEGEE CAT gave a prompted middle move racing evenly through the far turn then down the stretch as best of rest. PEACE OF EKATI played no factor. HELLUVA LIFE gave early retreat. SUPER CLASSIC folded up early.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

ENTRY.NAME: Tuskegee Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, evenly, held others

ENTRY.NAME: Knight's Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid clear far turn, drew off lane

ENTRY.NAME: Peace of Ekati
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Helluva Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave early retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Gravity
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to top, set pace, passed far turn, no match lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE OCTOBER 9, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 9 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considere d In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIRO KATE pressed to draw even on the turn ceding a clear lead to rival in upper stretch surging late to win clear. WARRIOR EMPRESS set the pace being hooked on the turn clearing along the rail in upper stretch being run down late. WEDDING CHAPEL stalked close up through the turn weakening in upper stretch finishing evenly to hold the others. LEADING INDICATOR faded from contention on the turn. TALK DIRTY raced evenly tiring in upper stretch. BRYCE'S PHILLY off slowly was outrun. HIGH HEAVEN gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior Empress
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked turn, cleared on rail lane, run down'

ENTRY.NAME: High Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Bryce's Philly
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Leading Indicator
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Wedding Chapel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, weakened lane, held rest

ENTRY.NAME: Giro Kate
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed even turn, ceded clear lead lane, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Dirty
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, tired lane
